mapper.insert: insert into service_personnel (service_id, name, password, age, gender, phone, specialtyid, native_place, work_experience, categoryid, level, chargestandard, work_city, rate, photo, video, myself, education, training, health, reward, commission, stores_id, service_stauts, program_code, service_grade, service_upline, ssionsid) values (#{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialtyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chargestandard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myself,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{training,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{storesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceStauts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceUpline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
